mapper.sql: t.id, t.eqp_id, t.alarm_code, t.alarm_name, t.alarm_detail, t.alarm_switch, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.create_date
mapper.select: select tt.eqp_id, tt.alarm_count, error_count from (select eqp_id,count(*) alarm_count, count(*) error_count from edc_ams_record where start_date between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and eqp_id in ( select eqp_id from fab_equipment where line_no = #{lineNo} ) group by eqp_id ) tt left join fab_equipment eqp on tt.eqp_id = eqp.eqp_id order by eqp.sort_no

select tt.eqp_id, tt.alarm_count, error_count from (select eqp_id,count(*) alarm_count, count(*) error_count from edc_ams_record where start_date between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and eqp_id in ( select eqp_id from fab_equipment where line_no = #{lineNo} and station_code = #{stationCode} ) group by eqp_id ) tt left join fab_equipment eqp on tt.eqp_id = eqp.eqp_id order by eqp.sort_no
